title: Ticket #2637: Clarify condor_shared_port documentation and add examples
description:
There are a number of questions about condor_shared_port that aren't really answered in the manual. For example:
  • How does the port for condor_shared_port relate to HIGHPORT/LOWPORT (e.g., should it be outside the HIGHPORT/LOWPORT range)?
  • How does the port for condor_shared_port relate to 9618?
  • Does the shared port include the collector?
  • Does the shared port need to be open (in the firewall) on every node that runs condor_master?
  • If you set up condor_shared_port, will a condor_reconfig make that take effect, or do you need to do condor_off/condor_on?

Also, it would be great if the example configuration files had examples for all of the shared port configuration -- for instance, there is no example for SHARED_PORT_ARGS.
remarks:
2011-Nov-15 14:38:49 by wenger:
Also, the manual says that the collector can be configured to use a shared port; but the details of the collector configuration are unclear about what is mandatory if you used a shared port at all, and what is only necessary if the collector uses a shared port.
